data.text:
COVID-19 Information for our Families

Ratterman & Son is taking the COVID-19 (Coronavirus) outbreak very seriously, as it’s our top priority is keeping the families we serve and our staff members safe. Our business is still operating as usual, and we are doing everything we can to keep our facility and equipment clean and sanitized. Currently we are operating at 100% capacity and face masks are required for people not fully vaccinated. The lounge is back OPEN. If you have further questions about how we are handling coronavirus, please contact us.

Family Owned & Operated

After losing a loved one, you can trust the experienced staff at Ratterman Funeral Home to help you celebrate your loved one’s life. Our staff has knowledgeable on assisting your family in planning a variety of funeral services and can assist your family in honoring your loved one no matter your personal preference, budget, culture, or religion. We pride ourselves on serving the southend and southwest community and surrounding areas with compassion, dignity, and respect. We live in the same communities we serve and are extremely proud of our part of town.

Our Services

Explore all the ways in which we can help you create a personalized, memorable experience that pays tribute to the life of your loved one.

Learn More

Preplanning

Learn how preplanning can provide your family with peace of mind and allow you to take your time in designing a meaningful service.

Learn More

Contact Us

Have questions? We are here to answer them all. Just contact us via phone or our contact form, and we will provide all the information you'll need.

Learn More
